welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Dartmouth, known for its beautiful waterfront and historic sites. We're excited for you to explore our city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Bedford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Bedford Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at State Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at State Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: A concourse located within the main terminal, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: A concourse located within the main terminal, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Martha's Vineyard Airport provides services for commercial airlines and private aircraft.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Martha's Vineyard Airport is used for private aircraft and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Plymouth Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger comfort.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Plymouth Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
